dependencies.description:
MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of the
Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.
dependencies.name: mpich

dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.
dependencies.name: py-h5py

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description:
Particle provides a pythonic interface to the Particle Data Group (PDG)
particle data tables and particle identification codes, with extended
particle information and extra goodies.
dependencies.name: py-particle

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python
dependencies.name: py-plotly

dependencies.description: Graph Neural Network Library for PyTorch.
dependencies.name: py-torch-geometric

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv
